name: Paichun - Easy on the Eyes
description: This style has been designed for paichuntranslations.com, but unfortunately, it can apply to most wordpress websites. First time coding ever, so I hope that everyone can forgive me. If you can help with setting it up the right way, I would appreciate it.
additional_info:
Okay, because the style may clash with other websites, it is best to specify what site it is for. After installing, click your stylish button in the browser and select "Manage All Styles".

Scroll through until you locate the Paichun, then click edit.

At the bottom of the page, select specify and select URLs on the domain. In the empty box, enter paichuntranslations.com. Click save and exit. Reload any pages.
